title: Remaining useful life prediction
description: Remaining useful life prediction model using MLPs & LSTMs
long_description: This model is designed for remaining useful life prediction tasks using MLPs & LSTMs. It is implemented in PyTorch and optimized for AURIX™ TC3x and TC4x automotive MCUs.

links.label: Model Zoo
links.heading: Model Zoo for AURIX™
links.sub-heading: Find your tools & Learn about getting started with developing Edge AI for AURIX™
